name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 28, in Suzhou, Jiangsu Province, a woman got into an argument with a local vendor while driving near Shihu Jingyuan Community. During the argument, the woman said to the vendor, "Outsiders, get out of Suzhou," which aroused public anger. Citizens surrounded the woman and her car, and shouted in unison, "Apologize! Apologize!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Released) Tsinghua University purchased promotion services on Twitter to promote the school's international students. Because the photos used in the advertisement were of Russians, many foreign netizens who saw the push advertisement left "good wishes"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After Israel killed the leader of Hezbollah, Chinese experts' previous comments on the situation between Iran and Israel were dug up one after another, sparking ridicule from netizens. Netizens responded, "Experts have never made correct predictions."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the official Kuaishou account of Hong Kong Satellite TV has also been banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Release) Xianyang, Shaanxi. A man said that he just went out for a while, and when he came back, he found that his house was demolished by the Changwu County Government, and there was no compensation. The man said: Is this what the Communist Party under Xi Jinping's leadership does? Please, President Xi Jinping, look at what you have done and compensate my family.
